name: Da Vinci's Demons Season 1
summary:
《达芬奇恶魔》由Starz电视网与英国BBC国际电视公司联合开发。

　　故事发生在意大利文艺复兴时期，青年的莱昂纳多·达·芬奇正值25岁的青春好时光性格傲慢，但极其聪明。与他关系密不可分的女人包括：佛罗伦萨共和国执政官洛伦佐·梅迪奇的妻子——当时有名的妖妇，心机城府的女政客克拉丽切·奥尔西尼，以及洛伦佐和他共同的情妇卢克蕾齐娅·多纳蒂。他是位艺术家、发明家、剑客、情圣、梦想家、理想主义者，他的智力和天赋将被仔细挖掘，同时，他挣扎地活在他自己的真实世界中，与宗教的谎言作斗争，因为他开始看到，并去创造未来。

　　Starz电视台的首席执行官克里斯•奥尔布莱切(Chris Albrecht)于4月17日宣布《达•芬奇的恶魔》获第二季续订，第二季的制作暂定于2013年5月在威尔士进行，回归时间是2014年。

eps.name: The Hanged Man
eps.desc: The Duke of Milan (Hugh Bonneville) is assassinated on 13 April 1477. Leonardo has designed a flying machine that works. The Pope Sixtus IV is revealed to have homosexual relationships. Leonardo designs a pigeon that flies when thrown up. Leonardo da Vinci sells his designs of air planes, automatic load canons and tanks.

eps.name: The Serpent
eps.desc: Leonardo begins building a war-machine for the Medicis, a mortar of sorts, and his first attempt fails. However, Lorenzo gives him a week to fix it. Meanwhile, Leonardo also continues his search for the Book of Leaves. The Pope sends his nephew to investigate Leonardo and learn more about his prowess.

eps.name: The Prisoner
eps.desc: Riaro visits the pope to inform him about Da Vinci. Da Vinci goes to a monastery where Vanessa came to aid sisters, who are claimed to be possessed. Because of these incidents, Lupo Mercuri, the curator of the Vatican secret archives, comes to fight the demons, and offers help. Da Vinci dissaproves Mercuri's acts, Da Vinci himself, not believing in demons. Because of his disbelieve, Da Vinci searches for a different reason to the possessed acting sisters.

eps.name: The Tower
eps.desc: The trial of Da Vinci for sodomy is immediately revealed to be a mere political ploy of Rome to disgrace the Medici's and Da Vinci realizes that he'll need to resort to more clever ways to thwart the supposed fair trial he's getting. Meanwhile, Lorenzo tries to woo the King and Queen of Spain into using the almost bankrupt Medici Bank to give it a much needed fiscal input. Da Vinci gets a surprise visitor that coaxes him into remembering an even more surprising memory from his childhood.

eps.name: The Devil
eps.desc: In an effort to learn more about the location of the Book of Leaves, the Turk sends Da Vinci on a mission to locate and rescue the Abyssinian, a cartographer who might help Da Vinci in understanding the map. But the cartographer is being held by a terrible foe deep in the Romanian countryside which is revealed to be non other than Vlad the Impaler better known as Dracula himself. Meanwhile, Giuliano continues to impress as he makes strides in his investigation to find the real spy in Florence. Lorenzo is attempting to form an alliance with the Duke of Urbin against the impending Roman war and Pope Sixtus is growing ever more tired of Count Riario's failures.

eps.name: The Hierophant
eps.desc: Leonardo builds an underwater suit and uses it to enter the Vatican from the sewers. The Pope tries to persuade the Duke of Urbino to help him conquer the Medici. After Leonardo enters the Vatican he approaches the Pope and the mysterious prisoner holding a great secret. Giuliano discovers the identity of Rome's spy, and is killed when he confronts her.

eps.name: The Lovers
eps.desc: The Pazzis plan to murder Lorenzo and Juliano on Easter Sunday. Guliano is saved by peasants and tries to return to the city. Meanwhile the turk helps Leonardo how to find the book of leaves and Vanessa finds out she is pregnant from Guliano. Later Lucretia makes a confession to Leonardo as he tries to help the Medicis. Unfortunately Guliano is killed by Pazzi men and we see Leonardo and Lorenzo locked in a room trying to protect themselves from the Pazzi's, but Riario destroyes the door with a musket.
